column1: Visitation will be held at Young & Sons Funeral Home on Friday
column2: June 12 from 4:00 to 8:00 pm and on Saturday from 6:30 to 9:30 am.  Parish Wake Friday evening at 4:30 pm. Rosary Saturday at 8:30 am.  Funeral Mass will be Saturday
column3: June 13 at St. Vincent de Paul Catholic Church    at 10:00 am with Rev. Rickey Valleroy officiating.    Burial in Mt. Hope Cemetery.
